Class Trustee

  • java.lang.Object
    • Trustee

  • public class Trustee
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains graphics (draw logic and images), actions (dunk logic, score splash rendering, playing scream sound), etc for an object the trustee and its appearance in the game.
    Author:
    Osher Cohen

      The constructor for the object representing the trustee.

      This is used to test if the projectile collided with the trustee.

      This method draws the trustee's image, as well as, any animations associated with him, to the JPanel.

      This is used to dunk the trustee.

      This is used to return the Rectangle representing the bounding box that surrounds the image.

      This is used to get the trustee out of the pool.

        public boolean collided(Projectile projectile)
        This is used to test if the projectile collided with the trustee.
        Parameters:
        projectile - - A reference to the object which represents the projectile
        Returns:
        True if the projectile collided with the trustee, otherwise it returns false.

      • move

        public void move(Pool pool,
        Projectile projectile,
        Score score,
        int distance)
        This is used to control the movement of the trustee.
        Parameters:
        pool - - An object that represents the pool that the trustee will be dunked into.
        projectile - - An object that represents the projectile.
        score - - An object that represents the player's score.
        distance - - The distance the trustee will move each frame.
